data.name: Pig Skin
data.description: Thick hide from a wild pig. Useful for crafting leather goods and certain magical items.

data.name: Tromatising Mask
data.description: A disturbing mask that inspires fear in enemies. Enhances fire damage and magical knowledge.

effects.description: Adds 90 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 16% Fire Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 25 Initiative to its stats when equipped.
Adds 25 Wisdom to its stats when equipped. Each point of wisdom increases your xp in combat and with skills. (1% extra per 10 wisdom)

data.name: Skull Ring
data.description: A silver ring topped with a tiny skull. Enhances health and both fire and air damage.

effects.description: Adds 20 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 11% Fire Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 11% Air Damage to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Topaz
data.description: A golden yellow gemstone with potent magical properties. Associated with earth energy.

data.name: Dreadful Amulet
data.description: An amulet that radiates ominous energy. Enhances health and both water and earth damage.

effects.description: Adds 40 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 10% Water Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 10% Earth Damage to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Skull Amulet
data.description: An amulet adorned with a tiny skull. Grants health and enhances both fire and air damage.

effects.description: Adds 40 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 10% Air Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 10% Fire Damage to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Minor Health Potion
data.description: A small but effective potion. Restores a fair amount of health in a pinch.

effects.description: Restores 70 HP at the start of the turn if the player has lost more than 50% of their health points.

data.name: Snakeskin Boots
data.description: Boots crafted from smooth snakeskin. Light, flexible, and surprisingly durable.

effects.description: Adds 80 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 8% Water Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds 8% Air Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds 6 Haste to its stats when equipped. The haste reduces the cooldown of a fight.

data.name: Apple Pie
data.description: A sweet, golden pie packed with apples. Restores a large amount of health and lifts your spirits.

effects.description: Heal 350 HP when the item is used.

data.name: Emerald Stone
data.description: A rough stone with hints of green crystal peeking through. Coveted by jewelers and enchanters alike. May be used to craft a higher-quality emerald.

data.name: Topaz Stone
data.description: A yellow stone that shimmers in the light. Used in powerful jewelry and elemental crafts. May be used to craft a higher-quality topaz.

data.name: Ruby Stone
data.description: A raw ruby, deep red and full of potential. Perfect for forging rings or enchanting weapons. May be used to craft a higher-quality ruby.

data.name: Sapphire Stone
data.description: A vibrant blue stone, prized for its magical properties and value in trade. May be used to craft a higher-quality sapphire.

data.name: Nettle Leaf
data.description: A stinging leaf, handled carefully by skilled alchemists for restorative brews.

data.name: Small Antidote
data.description: A basic remedy for poison. Not as powerful as a full antidote, but better than nothing.

effects.description: At the beginning of the turn, if the character has at least one poison on him, removes 20 poison damage.

data.name: Lifesteal Rune
data.description: A blood-red rune that, when activated, allows its wielder to draw life from their critical strikes.

effects.description: Restores 10% of the total attack of all elements in HP after a critical strike.

data.name: Burn Rune
data.description: A smoldering rune that applies lingering damage to enemies. The flames are impossible to extinguish by normal means.

effects.description: On his first turn, apply a burn effect of 20% of your attack of all elements. The damage is applied each turn and decreases by 10% each time.

data.name: Old Boots
data.description: Boots that once belonged to an old sage. Rumor has it you gain more experience when wearing them.

effects.description: Adds 90 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 5 Haste to its stats when equipped. The haste reduces the cooldown of a fight.
Adds 70 Wisdom to its stats when equipped. Each point of wisdom increases your xp in combat and with skills. (1% extra per 10 wisdom)
Adds 20 Prospecting to its stats when equipped. Each PP increases your chance of obtaining drops in combat and with skills. (1% extra per 10 PP)

data.name: Spider Leg
data.description: A long, jointed leg from a giant spider. The sharp end can still inject venom if handled carelessly.

data.name: Hunting Bow
data.description: A well-crafted bow designed for tracking and bringing down game. Balanced for both power and accuracy.

effects.description: Adds 15 Air Attack to its stats when equipped.
Adds 14 Fire Attack to its stats when equipped.
Adds 35% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).

data.name: Perfect Pearl
data.description: A flawless pearl that glows with inner light. It seems to attract other valuable items to its possessor.

effects.description: Adds 100 Prospecting to its stats when equipped. Each PP increases your chance of obtaining drops in combat and with skills. (1% extra per 10 PP)

data.name: Hard Leather Armor
data.description: A sturdy chest piece made of reinforced leather. Offers good protection while maintaining flexibility.

effects.description: Adds 90 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 15% Earth Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 15% Air Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 25 Initiative to its stats when equipped.
Adds 5% Fire Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds 5% Air Res to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Hard Leather Pants
data.description: Durable leather pants reinforced with steel studs. They allow for quick movement while providing good protection.

effects.description: Adds 80 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 2 Haste to its stats when equipped. The haste reduces the cooldown of a fight.
Adds 10% Air Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 10% Earth Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 6% Air Res to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Hard Leather Helmet
data.description: A sturdy helmet crafted from treated leather. The special lining enhances your ability to find treasures.

effects.description: Adds 80 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 10% Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 3% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).
Adds 50 Initiative to its stats when equipped.
Adds 50 Prospecting to its stats when equipped. Each PP increases your chance of obtaining drops in combat and with skills. (1% extra per 10 PP)

data.name: Hard Leather Boots
data.description: Comfortable boots made of toughened leather. The soles have been enchanted to help you find valuable items.

effects.description: Adds 45 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 4% Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 50 Prospecting to its stats when equipped. Each PP increases your chance of obtaining drops in combat and with skills. (1% extra per 10 PP)
Adds 6 Haste to its stats when equipped. The haste reduces the cooldown of a fight.

data.name: Small Pearls
data.description: Tiny, lustrous pearls harvested from freshwater mollusks. These pearls can be exchanged for a powerful item.

data.name: Corrupted Gem
data.description: A dark gem pulsing with twisted energy. Dropped by corrupted monsters and valued by the mysterious Cultist Wizard.

data.name: Lost World Map
data.description: An ancient map showing landmarks and locations long forgotten. Studying it grants profound insights and magical knowledge.

effects.description: Adds 100 Wisdom to its stats when equipped. Each point of wisdom increases your xp in combat and with skills. (1% extra per 10 wisdom)

data.name: Steel Fishing Rod
data.description: A professional-grade fishing rod with a steel core. Significantly increases fishing speed and has good durability.

effects.description: Adds 5 Water Attack to its stats when equipped.
Reduces cooldown by -30% when a character is fishing.

data.name: Steel Pickaxe
data.description: A sturdy pickaxe forged from quality steel. Makes mining significantly more efficient for experienced miners.

effects.description: Adds 5 Earth Attack to its stats when equipped.
Reduces cooldown by -30% when a character mines a resource.

data.name: Steel Gloves
data.description: Reinforced gloves with steel plates protecting the palms and knuckles. Perfect for efficient herb gathering.

effects.description: Adds 5 Earth Attack to its stats when equipped.
Reduces cooldown by -30% when a character harvest a plant.

data.name: Steel Axe
data.description: A well-balanced axe with a razor-sharp steel blade. Makes short work of even the toughest trees.

effects.description: Adds 5 Earth Attack to its stats when equipped.
Reduces cooldown by -30% when a character logs a tree.

data.name: Shuriken
data.description: A set of star-shaped throwing weapons with razor-sharp edges. Perfect for swift, precise attacks at medium range.

effects.description: Adds 15 Earth Attack to its stats when equipped.
Adds 14 Air Attack to its stats when equipped.
Adds 35% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).

data.name: Healing Rune
data.description: A stone tablet etched with ancient symbols of restoration. When activated, it emits a warm green glow that mends wounds and restores vitality.

effects.description: Every 3 played turns, restores 5% of HP at the start of the turn.

data.name: Protection Rune
data.description: A simple stone tablet etched with protective symbols. When activated, it creates a translucent magical shell that absorbs incoming damage.

effects.description: When they drop below 40% of their HP, they gain 40 % resistance to all elements for 3 turns. Activates once per combat. This effect is only active during boss fights.

data.name: Healing Aura Rune
data.description: A stone tablet that radiates soothing green energy. When activated, it creates a restorative field that gradually heals all allies within its radius.

effects.description: Every 2 played turns, they heal all allies for 10% of their maximum HP. This effect does not heal the caster.

data.name: Vampire Blood
data.description: A vial of dark, mysterious blood. Said to grant strength and longevity, but only to the truly daring.

data.name: Vampire Tooth
data.description: A long, sharp fang from a vampire. Still seems to hunger for blood even after being separated from its owner.

data.name: Dreadful Staff
data.description: A fearsome staff, rumored to be crafted from the remains of legendary monsters. Pulses with elemental power.

effects.description: Adds 25 Water Attack to its stats when equipped.
Adds 25 Earth Attack to its stats when equipped.
Adds 5% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).

data.name: Bandit Armor
data.description: Rugged armor pieced together from spoils and scraps. Worn by those who live on the edge.

effects.description: Adds 160 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 20% Fire Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 20% Earth Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 6% Earth Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds 6% Water Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds 5% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).
Adds 50 Initiative to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Skull Wand
data.description: A wand with a miniature skull at its tip. Channels both air and fire magic with deadly precision.

effects.description: Adds 25 Air Attack to its stats when equipped.
Adds 25 Fire Attack to its stats when equipped.
Adds 5% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).
